lastIntent:
fix(game): initialize remaining counties when game starts

The counties tray was empty because remainingCounties was never
populated in the countyPlacementStore when the game started.

- Add useEffect to initialize remainingCounties from allCaliforniaCounties
- Convert County[] to CountyPiece[] with required properties
- Add setRemainingCounties call in GameContainer when game starts

Fixes: Counties (0) showing empty tray after clicking Begin Exploration
